senses.sense_definition: The short, thick first digit of the human hand, set apart from the other four fingers.

examples.text: She accidentally hit her <w>thumb</w> with the hammer while hanging a picture.
The baby fell asleep quietly sucking his <w>thumb</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A small version of a digital image or video used for previewing.

examples.text: Click on the <w>thumb</w> to view the image in full resolution.
The gallery displays a <w>thumb</w> for each video in the collection.

senses.sense_definition: The movable part of a slider or scroll bar in a graphical user interface that indicates position.

examples.text: You can drag the <w>thumb</w> to scroll through the document quickly.
The size of the scroll bar <w>thumb</w> indicates how much content is currently visible.

senses.sense_definition: A mechanical attachment on an excavator bucket used to grip and hold objects.

examples.text: The operator used the hydraulic <w>thumb</w> to pick up the large rocks.
Attaching a <w>thumb</w> to the bucket makes it easier to clear debris.

senses.sense_definition: To turn the pages of a book or magazine quickly, often to glance at the contents.

examples.text: I like to <w>thumb</w> through magazines while waiting for my appointment.
She <w>thumbed</w> through the report looking for the sales chart.

senses.sense_definition: To solicit a free ride from a passing vehicle by pointing one's thumb upward or in the direction of travel.

examples.text: They decided to <w>thumb</w> a ride to the next town because the bus was late.
He stood by the road and <w>thumbed</w> a lift from a truck driver.

senses.sense_definition: To touch, handle, or operate something using one's thumb.

examples.text: He nervously <w>thumbed</w> the button on the remote control.
The speaker stood at the podium, <w>thumbing</w> his notes before starting.

senses.sense_definition: To manipulate the mechanism of a firearm, specifically to pull back the hammer, using the thumb.

examples.text: The cowboy <w>thumbed</w> back the hammer of his revolver.
He <w>thumbed</w> the safety catch before aiming at the target.

senses.sense_definition: The eastern region of the Lower Peninsula of Michigan, which resembles a thumb on a mitten.

examples.text: Turnip Rock is a popular tourist destination located in the <w>Thumb</w>.
We drove up to the <w>Thumb</w> to enjoy the coastline and small towns.
